headline: Will Devon Energy (DVN) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Devon Energy (DVN) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: Devon Energy Rallied Nearly 15% in Q1 While the Nasdaq Had Its Worst Quarter Since the Bear Market
summary: Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN) got off to a great start in 2025.  The oil company's stock price surged 14.3% in the first quarter, according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.  Here's a look at what fueled Devon's strong first-quarter rally and whether it has the fuel to continue heading higher.
